text: Gu guigira nde nzuai, fhum Fhe Bakɨmen kamthooŋ gumgi vhɨrve gum, ana piin kav tɨvar vhuuaŋ mbui gumgir vhɨrve, mbe guigira nde ntige khar gari bigi ganɨngeŋ nzuav vuzvuk bakɨme mben ki. Mbe maaŋ muuŋgi, bigɨna thueŋ gangi fhu. Mbe vhɨra kha nde mbararagi buni, mbe nta mbarararga vuzvuk bakɨme ki. Mbe maaŋ muuŋgi buna thueŋ mbararagi fhu.”
